Regarding second rule:
```adblock
imdb.com#$?#body:has(div[data-testid="promptable"]:has(.ipc-rating-display-with-poster__image)) { overflow: auto !important; }
```

If I'm not wrong, it's not necessary to use `:has` two times, something like this:
```adblock
imdb.com#$?#body:has(div[data-testid="promptable"] .ipc-rating-display-with-poster__image) { overflow: auto !important; }
```
should match the same element.

@@ -7,6 +7,8 @@
 !
 ! SECTION: Popups - Regular rules
 !

comment.body:
` { display: none !important; }` is not necessary for `#?#` rules - they won't apply on content blockers. So, this part of the rule should be removed.
@AdamWr @BlazDT could you check it on your side? I don't have the popup.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0 with the latest version of filter_14_Annoyances

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0105226/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The following lines from `filter_14_Annoyances` are disabling the rate button (1st line) and messing with the margin when clicking the rate button (2nd line).

imdb.com#$#div[data-testid="promptable"] { display: none !important; }
imdb.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; }

Can be tested on any movie page on IMDB.

comment.body:
Data related to the highlighted advertisement known as PowerLink exists in a non-advertisement dcinside.com web request.
If an adblocker blocks the request, this blocking will cause an error.
Please use Safari web browser instead of dcinside app.

<details><summary>Korean - 한국어</summary>

파워링크로 알려진 강조된 광고와 관련된 데이터는 광고가 아닌 디시인사이드 웹 요청에 존재합니다.
만약 광고 차단기가 그 요청을 차단하면, 이 차단은 애러를 일으킵니다.
디시인사이드 앱 대신에 Safari 웹 브라우저를 사용해주세요.

</details>
